value.title: Britain’s first self-driving bus launches in Cambridge
value.excerpt: Self-driving buses will drive alongside other traffic for the first time in the UK as part of a trial in Cambridge. The three-wheel ‘autonomous passenger shuttles’ or ‘Auto-Shuttles’ were launched Thursday at the University of Cambridge.

value.title: Russia's Sberbank unit unveils self-driving vehicle FLIP
value.excerpt: SberAutoTech, a subsidiary of Russia's largest lender Sberbank, has developed a fully self-driving vehicle, FLIP, which the company on Thursday described as a "taxi of the future".
